name: texture sphere
desc: The texture_sphere module provides a means to (texture map) project images onto a sphere.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Longitude Dimension
properties.desc: The Longitude Dimension slider will set the sphere resolution for longitude.

properties.name: Latitude Dimension
properties.desc: The Latitude Dimension slider will set the sphere resolution for latitude.

properties.name: Radius
properties.desc: The Radius controls the size of the sphere to be texture mapped. (Set to the radius of the Earth by default.)

properties.name: Starting Longitude
properties.desc: The Starting Longitude is the polar coordinate in degrees to start creating the textured_sphere.

properties.name: Ending Longitude
properties.desc: The Ending Longitude is the polar coordinate in degrees to stop creating the textured_sphere.

properties.name: Starting Latitude
properties.desc: The Starting Latitude is the polar coordinate from the equator to start creating the textured sphere.

properties.name: Ending Latitude
properties.desc: The Ending Latitude is the polar coordinate from the equator to stop creating the textured sphere.
